GeneDef.label: witch's factor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this "gene" are cursed by the witch's factor. As the curse deepens, their physical abilities will change.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Actively grants the carrier the curse of the witch's factor.
Cannot be removed once added; automatically re-added if lost.
The witch's factor can only exist as a "gene" after unlocking the "witch's factor gene" research.
